North America, Details: ** Run of North American stadium shows, 13 gigs total (12 stateside + 1 Canadian). Starts April 10th in Minneapolis. Includes a Canadian date on April 22nd in Vancouver. The Pretty Reckless supporting. Specific cities/venues mentioned: Minneapolis (April 10th), Vancouver (April 22nd).
western_tours.venue_details: ** Run of North American stadium shows, 13 gigs total (12 stateside + 1 Canadian). Starts April 10th in Minneapolis. Includes a Canadian date on April 22nd in Vancouver. The Pretty Reckless supporting. Specific cities/venues mentioned: Minneapolis (April 10th), Vancouver (April 22nd).

western_tours.regions: North America, Details: ** Two-night "No Repeat Weekend" format in numerous US cities, plus select one-off concerts. Rotating support: Pantera/Suicidal Tendencies and Limp Bizkit/Ice Nine Kills. Dates kick off April 19th in Syracuse, New York, and run through June 27th and 29th in Denver. Also includes a two-show stop at the Sonic Temple fest on May 9th and 11th. Specific cities/venues mentioned: Syracuse, New York (April 19th), Denver (June 27th, 29th), Sonic Temple fest (May 9th, 11th).
western_tours.venue_details: ** Two-night "No Repeat Weekend" format in numerous US cities, plus select one-off concerts. Rotating support: Pantera/Suicidal Tendencies and Limp Bizkit/Ice Nine Kills. Dates kick off April 19th in Syracuse, New York, and run through June 27th and 29th in Denver. Also includes a two-show stop at the Sonic Temple fest on May 9th and 11th. Specific cities/venues mentioned: Syracuse, New York (April 19th), Denver (June 27th, 29th), Sonic Temple fest (May 9th, 11th).

western_tours.regions: North America, Details: ** Over 30 dates. Begins with a Red Rocks show in Colorado (July 25th) and ends at Phoenix's Arizona Financial Theatre (October 12th). KT Tunstall joins for a one-off at Murphys, California's Ironstone Amphitheatre. Specific cities/venues mentioned: Red Rocks (Colorado, July 25th), Arizona Financial Theatre (Phoenix, October 12th), Ironstone Amphitheatre (Murphys, California).
